item.title: Creating own website part 2: Setting up a static website with AWS
item.description: The way I host this website is via AWS. It’s pretty cheap to host and can be set up for free.

item.title: Creating own website part 1: The build and design of the site
item.description: I decided it was time for me to build my own website and publish it to my own domain. I think it’s something that every developer should try.
